content.raw:
Thanks for porting all these styles from Gazebo! We will need to tweak them a bit because some of the other widgets are looking weird. I've been trying to follow @spaepcke's [style guide](https://drive.google.com/a/osrfoundation.org/uc?id=0B_0d9M9XDFBVa2RiMnJFYnRVWUk&export=download).

![pubsubstyle.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/2543278736-pubsubstyle.png)

Note that in the short term, we will have a documented way for downstream projects to override the style with their own custom styles. It is possible that then, we move all the styles currently here to `gazebo_experimental` and either leave ign-gui with the native Qt style, or a more neutral material design style.
content.html:
Thanks for porting all these styles from Gazebo! We will need to tweak them a bit because some of the other widgets are looking weird. I've been trying to follow @spaepcke's style guide.

Note that in the short term, we will have a documented way for downstream projects to override the style with their own custom styles. It is possible that then, we move all the styles currently here to gazebo_experimental and either leave ign-gui with the native Qt style, or a more neutral material design style.
